column5: Anyone know where to purchase them? I searched Canadian Tire's website, they don't list any. Would Wal-mart have them?
walmart has vinyl ones for $5 they come in navy or army green just picked some up last week!

You can get cheap $1 ones at the dollar store, I think dollarama (They are clear in colour).  I bought like 5 of them as emergency back ups last year, they are very compact and great to keep in the tackle box.  If you're looking for a long term solution, I'd invest in a good rain suit.
home depot has them too for under $5
We have rain suits but most times we prefer the $1 ponchos you can get (i.e. @ $ama).  Compact and disposable.

I was a scout leader for years & we bought dozens of them not sure what the cost would be now, but I've had 3 of them for over 15 years they are the best for canoeing, I kneel down when canoeing and the only thing that gets wet is your arm.  Google Scouts Canada to find closest location to you Tight Lines Richard
